title: Problems with last update
body:
1- every time after i login i got message : failed to create a mastery page on server 
and all my pages delete and i create it again and problem repeated

2- sometimes when chose type of game in champ select all icon , runes and mastery  not available 
and the time end without chose champ and I got afk in queue for 5 mint 

plz fix this problems or  What is the solution 

thanx

replies.body:
It sounds like you have a bad config that's failing to save and sync to our servers.  Resetting your settings should get this fixed up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

We aren't able to remove any [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) timers, but hopefully that will help prevent more.  I hope that helps!
